Regional Climate Temperature Anomalies

Source: R/data.R
climate_temps.Rd

A minimal dataset showing temperature anomalies relative to pre-industrial baseline across different regions and time periods.

climate_temps

Format

A data frame with 20 rows and 7 variables:

region

Geographic region or category

period

Time period of measurement

anomaly

Temperature anomaly in degrees Celsius

lower

Lower bound of uncertainty range

upper

Upper bound of uncertainty range

certainty

Confidence level: High or Medium

category

Category grouping (Global, Hemisphere, Continental, etc.)

Source

Simulated data based on climate science literature.

Examples

data(climate_temps)
head(climate_temps)
#>                region period anomaly lower upper certainty    category
#> 1              Global   2023    1.45  1.38  1.52      High      Global
#> 2 Northern Hemisphere   2023    1.62  1.52  1.72      High  Hemisphere
#> 3 Southern Hemisphere   2023    1.28  1.18  1.38      High  Hemisphere
#> 4              Arctic   2023    2.85  2.55  3.15    Medium       Polar
#> 5           Antarctic   2023    0.45  0.30  0.60    Medium       Polar
#> 6       North America   2023    1.78  1.58  1.98      High Continental
